channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: Unwind with ITV
channel.desc: Your daily escape designed to calm the mind and encourage relaxation and reflection.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: Katie Piper's Weekend Escape
channel.desc: Join Katie in her self-built space for resetting and relaxing in - as she and Anton du Beke try some clubbercise, hairdresser Michael Douglas transforms a midwife of 48 years. S1 Ep5.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: Love Your Garden
channel.desc: Grassmoor: Alan Titchmarsh and his team head to Derbyshire to build an exciting garden for sprightly D-Day veteran Jack Parrott and his wife of 68 years Margaret.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: Love Your Weekend with Alan Titchmarsh
channel.desc: Joining Alan at Manor Farm this time are Chris McCausland, Penny Lancaster, Stephen Mangan and some giant tortoises who make a showstopping entrance.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: Jimmy and Shivi's Farmhouse Breakfast
channel.desc: Ellie Simmonds: Jimmy and Shivi are joined by Paralympic swimmer Ellie Simmonds as Jimmy has an unusual idea for feeding the maras at the wildlife park. S2 Ep6.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: ITV News
channel.desc: National and international news with reports and analysis from ITV's Correspondents in the UK and around the world as well as the latest major sports results.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: James Martin's Saturday Morning
channel.desc: James is joined in the kitchen of his Hampshire home by Rob and Dave Nicholson from Springtime on the Farm and chefs Richard Bertinet, Claude Bosi, and John Hooker. S8 Ep21.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: Jeremy Pang's Hong Kong Kitchen
channel.desc: Mel Giedroyc: Chef Jeremy Pang invites good friend, actor, presenter and writer Mel Giedroyc to an unforgettable trip down memory lane in the city of Hong Kong. S1 Ep1.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: ITV Lunchtime News
channel.desc: The latest headlines from around the world at lunchtime with reports and analysis from ITV's Correspondents, all of which are followed by a national weather forecast.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: ITV Racing
channel.desc: Francesca Cumani presents racing from four different venues on a superb day of racing - the feature meeting of the day is at Haydock and includes the Temple and Sandy Lane Stakes.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: Pictionary
channel.desc: Mel Giedroyc hosts the game show where teams compete to guess words or phrases represented by drawings - the teams this time are joined by Jeff Brazier and Scarlett Moffatt. S1 Ep5.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: Tipping Point
channel.desc: Political pundit Robert Peston, Loose Woman Judi Love, and reality star Pete Wicks join Ben Shephard in the hope of winning 20,000 pounds for charity as they take on the machine.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: ITV Evening News
channel.desc: National and international news with reports and analysis from ITV's Correspondents in the UK and around the world as well as the latest major sports results.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: ITV News London
channel.desc: The latest news and weather from London and the South East.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: The Chase Celebrity Special
channel.desc: Bradley Walsh hosts as one Chaser is all that stands between Toby Anstis, Paula Radcliffe, Rav Wilding, Vanessa Feltz and thousands of pounds for their chosen charities. S13 Ep5.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: Britain's Got Talent
channel.desc: The last set of eight acts who impressed the judges during the audition rounds put on the performance of their lives as they compete for a spot in the live final. S18 Ep13.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: The 1% Club
channel.desc: Find out how clever you are as Lee Mack presents the quiz where it doesn't matter how good you are at quizzes and where 100 contestants could win up to 100,000 pounds. S4 Ep16.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: Fake
channel.desc: Eldorado: Gripping drama series. When Birdie interviews Tina's family and learns that she had always been a fantasist, she feels surer about trusting some grandiose promises by Joe. S1 Ep4.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: ITV News
channel.desc: National and international news with reports and analysis from ITV's Correspondents in the UK and around the world.
